posts.description: Co-Workers As Customers: Lessons from Airbnb & Etsy // Speaker Deck
posts.extended: RT @jnunemaker: Great deck on building tools for your company and open sourcing them. Tooling culture means enabling people.
@sparkdevices Tried to install your CLI with "npm install -g spark-cli" and it fails and I get this- any tips? =]
@sparkdevices Tried that and @hunter_tj's suggestion- all same: "fatal error: 'IOKit/IOKitLib.h' file not found"
